thought: To craft the red_sandstone_stairs, I need to place three blocks of either red_sandstone, chiseled_red_sandstone, or cut_red_sandstone in a staircase formation on the crafting grid. The only block available to me is chiseled_red_sandstone, so I will start by placing one of those in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 1 with quantity 1
